features: FITS ANYWHERE: Less than 5 inches wide, perfect for small spaces.Filter type:Reusable
YOUR PERFECT AMOUNT: Brew any cup size between 6-12oz with Keurig K-Cup pods.
ONE CUP RESERVOIR: Just add fresh water for each brew.
FAST & FRESH BREWED: Coffee made in minutes.
CORD STORAGE: For easy transport and tidy countertops.
TRAVEL MUG FRIENDLY: Removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7.0 inches tall and holds a full accidental brew for easy cleanup.
ENERGY EFFICIENT: Auto off feature turns off your coffee maker 90 seconds after your last brew, helping to save energy.
COMPATIBLE WITH THE MY K-CUP UNIVERSAL REUSABLE COFFEE FILTER: Brew your own ground coffee (sold separately).
INCLUDED IN THE BOX: Keurig K-Mini single serve coffee maker.
body.description: The Keurig K-Mini single serve coffee maker in Studio Gray features a sleek design with matte finish, and at less than 5 inches wide is the perfect size for any space or occasion. The K-Mini brewer is effortlessly simple to use, just add fresh water to the reservoir, pop in your favorite K-Cup pod, press the brew button and enjoy fresh brewed, delicious coffee in minutes. Choose from hundreds of delicious K-Cup pod varieties to enjoy 6-12oz of your favorite coffee, tea, cocoa, and iced beverages. With a single cup reservoir and cord storage, the K-Mini coffee maker is the portable brewer that makes anywhere perfect for great coffee. The K-Mini coffee maker is available in a variety of matte-finish colors. Based on consumer feedback, we have updated the K-Mini Brewer. Customer reviews have been removed that relate to the previous version of the brewer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Brands You Love 2 K-Cup Pod

Why did you change the shape of the Keurig K-Mini single serve coffee maker? We have updated the K-Mini coffee maker with a new, sleek design. At less than 5” wide, the K-Mini coffee maker is our slimmest coffee maker. What type of pods are compatible with the Keurig K-Mini coffee maker? The K-Mini coffee maker brews Keurig K-Cup pods. It does not brew K-Carafe pods, K-Mug pods, Vue pods, or Rivo pods. Can I use the My K-Cup Universal Reusable Coffee Filter with the Keurig K-Mini coffee maker? Yes, the K-Mini coffee maker is compatible with the Keurig My K-Cup Universal Reusable Coffee Filter. Does the K-Mini coffee maker have auto-off? Yes, the Keurig K-Mini coffee maker will automatically turn off 90 seconds after the last brew. Can I adjust the size of my beverage with the Keurig K-Mini single serve coffee maker? Yes, the K-Mini coffee maker brews any cup size between 6-12oz depending on how much water you pour into the reservoir.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keurig K-Mini: Brewing Joy, One Cup at a Time
reviews.reviewText: The Keurig K-Mini Single Serve Coffee Maker has become my morning hero, adding a touch of cozy convenience to my daily routine. Its Studio Gray finish fits seamlessly into my kitchen, but it's the joy it brings that truly stands out.This compact wonder has streamlined my mornings. Its size is a space-saver without compromising on performance. Brewing sizes from 6 to 12 ounces cater perfectly to my varying caffeine needs throughout the day, ensuring each cup is just right.The setup is a breeze—no rocket science required. Just fill the reservoir, pop in your favorite K-Cup pod, and press a button. It's that simple. The speed at which it brews is impressive; in no time, I have a steaming cup of goodness ready to kick-start my day.The best part? Its portability. Whether I'm working in my home office or craving a cozy corner in the living room, I can easily move it around to suit my mood.Admittedly, it's not the quietest brewer out there, but the delightful aroma wafting through the air makes up for the noise.In essence, the Keurig K-Mini is a charming addition to my daily rituals. It's more than just a coffee maker; it's a reliable companion that effortlessly delivers that warm, comforting cup, creating moments of joy sip after sip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We have had this same brand and style before and really liked it so after a few years when ours stopped working we did not hesitate to purchase another one. I did get a new color and I absolutely love it. It works great looks great fits the space I have for it great I do notI have any complaints. It makes great coffee and it’s easy to use and also my husband and I love the single cup feature, but if he wants a 2nd cup it only takes a couple of minutes as it heats up quickly.I would purchase this brand and style again and I would highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works well, but kind of inexpensively made
reviews.reviewText: One month of ownership and it works well so far. I like that it’s small and doesn’t take up much counter space. You add one cup of water at a time. Easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So disappointing. Do not recommend.
reviews.reviewText: Update: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ I was able to return this to Amazon and bought another one locally. New works fine so the previous one was indeed faulty. I updated it to 4 stars from 1.I was really excited about this because of my prior experience with the brand. This should be a simple device to operate with only two buttons. It arrived last night and went to use it this morning add it’s not priming the water. I’ve reset, unplugged, swapped water…done everything and it’s still not working. I’ve been using their brand for the last 6 years so I’m familiar with their devices. This one doesn’t measure up and was a disappointment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fast replacement of my broken coffee machine
reviews.reviewText: Of course as the guests arrived for Christmas holidays, my old Keurig broke down (it was 10 years old, so it gave a lot!) This new one cup one shipped fast and made it easy for everyone to make their own quickly. It's super lightweight and narrow which is nice and makes a good cup of coffee. Instructions weren't quite right (thought we had to push buttons twice instead of once) but once we figured it out, worked great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I loved it, but after 3 months Keurig is replacing it. See update
reviews.reviewText: My first Keurig finally stopped working. My late husband and I had received it as a gift. It was small and really worked well. We had it eleven years, so it was time for a new one. I decided on the Keurig mini since it’s now just and I only use coffee pods this was perfect. Well it has a few quirks and I wondered if any other customers who purchased this mini Keurig had similar issues.First it is loud when I first start it and it’s heating the water. Then as it’s dispensing the coffee into a cup small drops of coffee go all over and I’m wiping it up after I brew. No complaints I don’t mind that. It’s possible its splashing out of the cup as the coffee comes out quite fast. Lastly after you place the pod and pull the lid over it, it seems not to go down all the way. I hear the snap of the pod being opened on top and bottom, but there seems to be a small opening. It just close all the way as my old Keurig did. The coffee brews just fine but I’m curious about that.Otherwise the Keurig mini is a great little, coffee, tea, cappuccino and hot chocolate machine. There are so many great K cups on the market you can never get bored.Update November 12The mini brewer stopped working I put water in, put the pod in, placed the cup, pushed the button to brew it took the water out of the reservoir but it didn’t brew. I tried again and nothing . To say I’m disappointed is an understatement. I’ve only had this three months and already it stopped working.I called Keurig and they were helpful, they sent me an email with instructions how to get another one.Honestly I’m not sure I want another one. I think there was something wrong with the unit because it was so noisy when I turned it on to brew. I’ll post when I get the replacement, which will be the exact same one! I didn’t want a fancy replacement just note this exact one, I offered to pay the difference to upgrade to a different mini brewer, but it’s under warranty so I have to get the same one. I’ll update when I receive it and try it it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have waited one full year to write this review. The Keurig is still going strong with one year of use. I like this machine it looks good and works good. However this machine has sort of a delay while it’s heating the water. It doesn’t bother me but be aware the higher end Keurigs don’t have this delay. There were a couple times I must not have put enough water and had to add some to get it to brew. It’s a solid machine and I am happy with my purchase but when it dies eventually I would rather have the mini plus because it has a strong button and a removable reservoir for easier cleaning and cost only a little more. In retrospect I wish I had got the Keurig K mini plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice little single serve
reviews.reviewText: I just bought this K Mini to replace my large Keurig that finally gave out after 8 years. I love the smaller footprint that frees up counter space! It’s so much cleaner looking than my older bulkier machine. That being said the only complaint I have is that the coffee is never truly hot and I always have to pop the cup in the microwave to get it hot enough. Not a dealbreaker for the price but in the future I may purchase another brand. I do love the convenience of the single cup brewer though.
Great if you live alone or have limited space and you want real coffee not instant in the morning.

reviews.reviewTitle: Bought for wife and she loves it
reviews.reviewText: Had been thinking of buying one of these machines for a while, and when my wife saw this one "we" needed to get it. Need I say more its pretty and pink. It fits on our little bar area and produces great cups of coffee. Especially if you just want to make just one cup and not a whole pot. Would definitely recommend this machine to everyone. I love it more now that I found out they have pods for mcdonalds coffee, no more drive thru coffee for me anymore.

reviews.reviewTitle: This is perfect and takes up suck little space
reviews.reviewText: Easy to clean. Love the Color and sleek design so it tucks away easily on your countertop.

Muy practica si no te gusta estas poniendo la cafetera completa, cumple su cometido, es muy rápida y fácil de usar, además que puedes comprar tus capsulas de diferentes sabores. ideal para la oficina o para poca gente.

reviews.reviewTitle: Don't Buy for India - Plugged into Wall and All Circuits Went Kaput
reviews.reviewText: Love Keurig products - decided to order one for our flat in India. Even ordered some local flavor K-cups. Plugged into the wall and heard a loud bang. And a bunch of circuits went kaput - and the machine does not work after that in any outlet. I think it's only meant to work in 110V settings.
